TAO is an Open Source e-Testing platform that empowers you to build, deliver, and share innovative and engaging assessments online – in any language or subject matter.

Can you meet the Challenge ?

prompt.body: How Many Test takers already took a test delivered by TAO in the world  ?
From top classify the following QTI interactions supported by TAO according to their relevance for your own e-assessment
In all QTI interactions, any textBlock may actually contain pictures, formmatted texts or mathMl expressions. Order the pictures !

As you can see you may render mathML expression. The syntax may be mathML or TeX 
Associate the right syntax with the way it should look alike !
Did you know that a QTI associate could constraint how many associations the test taker has to make ?

body.body:
Do you know the french poet Charles Baudelaire ?

{{interaction_gapmatchinteraction_55099ee405bf1192870490}}
{{img_55099ee406954938622012}}

Au pays parfumé que le soleil caresse,
  J’ai connu, sous un dais d’arbres tout empourprés
  Et de palmiers d’où pleut sur les yeux la {{choice_gap_55099ee406341146082059}}  ,
  Une dame créole aux charmes ignorés.

  Son teint est pâle et chaud; la brune enchanteresse
  A dans le cou des airs noblement maniérés;
  Grande et svelte en marchant comme une {{choice_gap_55099ee40640e696384773}} ,
  Son sourire est tranquille et ses yeux assurés.

  Si vous alliez, Madame, au vrai pays de {{choice_gap_55099ee406495052081425}} ,
  Sur les bords de la Seine ou de la verte {{choice_gap_55099ee406519255151727}} ,
  Belle digne d’orner les antiques manoirs,

  Vous feriez, à l’abri des ombreuses retraites
  Germer mille {{choice_gap_55099ee4065a5289691119}} dans le coeur des poètes,
  Que vos grands yeux rendraient plus soumis que vos noirs.

prompt.body: QTI Gap Match is very useful for language proficiency or for memory test

body.body:
Did you know you could change easily colors, fonts used in your item using the appearance function of the item creator ? 
{{interaction_matchinteraction_55099ee47cffc451732166}}
Runs in any modern web browser ?

{{img_55099ee500e6f548026305}}
In-line text entry ? Inline Choice ? Free Text entry or Upload a file interaction ..

Pablo Ruiz y Picasso, also known as Pablo Picasso (Spanish: [ˈpaβlo piˈkaso]; 25 October 1881 – 8 April 1973), was a Spanish painter, sculptor, printmaker, ceramicist, stage designer, poet and playwright who spent most of his adult life in France. As one of the greatest and most influential artists of the 20th century, he is known for co-founding the {{interaction_inlinechoiceinteraction_55099ee5000e2170427409}}  movement, the invention of constructed sculpture, the co-invention of collage, and for the wide variety of styles that he helped develop and explore. Among his most famous works are the proto-Cubist Les Demoiselles d'Avignon (1907), and G {{interaction_textentryinteraction_55099ee500533319388377}} (1937)

{{img_55099ee500f1d223481813}}
{{interaction_extendedtextinteraction_55099ee500826965516618}}
{{interaction_uploadinteraction_55099ee500b7b594954685}}

prompt.body: Describe the Rose period of Picasso in a few words
Feeling some artistic insipration? Upload your drawing, word any documents you would like to
Select Point interaction. Try to locate the home of TAO

A USA RoadTrip using a graphic order interaction. 
Jérôme visited first Alaska, as the place was a bit too cold he visited Florida. Bored with DisneyLand , he went to the Nevada. Having wasted all his money, he decided to go to Washington, South Dakota, Wyoming and finished his trip in Texas where he now runs his own ranch.

From Luxembourg to Budapest : itinerary ...
Joel wants to taste some delicious Pörkölt, he booked a flight from Luxembourg to Budapest with a connection in Zurich. Draw Joel's itinerary on the map
